short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the persuavise messages and get only the raw informations: the hotels and their price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide the persuavise messages displayed on sites such as booking.com and hotels.com, in order to get only the raw informations: the hotels and their price.
This will allow you to make your choice without being influenced by these messages.
A button will allow you to return to the original state.

At the moment, this extension only works with the following sites: booking.com, hotels.com, trivago.com and trivago.fr.

Keep calm and book quietly !!!
